Flow.description: DR - 6/24/24 - Replaced by outbound comm records
Flow.label: DEPRECATED Error on File - 7 day warning

textTemplates.name: BridgeLegal_Email
textTemplates.text:
Meghan,

This is a critical reminder that {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c} {!$Record.litify_pm__Last_Name__c} for the {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case has been in an "error on file" status for the past seven days, and the designated time for correction is nearing expiration.

As per the terms outlined in the governing IO and MSA, we will have no alternative but to request a credit or replacement for this case if not corrected within the next 3 days.

Your immediate attention to this matter is of utmost importance, and we trust you will take necessary action promptly.

Best Regards,
Saddle Rock Legal Group
888-686-6454
